name: Battlefield 3
description: Large-scale modern military shooter with destructible environments and intense multiplayer battles.

name: Battlefield 4
description: Modern warfare FPS with massive 64-player battles, naval combat, and Levolution map-changing events.

name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2
description: Tactical shooter featuring the Bad Company squad with enhanced destruction and engaging multiplayer.

name: Battlefield 1
description: WWI-era shooter with epic battles across multiple fronts, featuring period-authentic weapons and vehicles.

name: Battlefield V
description: WWII multiplayer shooter with immersive combat, grand operations, and battle royale mode.

name: Battlefield: Hardline
description: Cops vs criminals themed Battlefield with heist modes, vehicle pursuits, and urban warfare.

name: Battlefield 6 Campaign
description: Near-future warfare with advanced technology, massive maps, and dynamic weather events.
